# kABUIDProperty

**Global Variable**

The unique ID for this record. It’s guaranteed never to change, no matter how much the record changes. If you need to store a reference to a record, use this value. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].

## Declaration

```swift
let kABUIDProperty: String
```

## Constants

- **kABCreationDateProperty**: The date when the record was first saved. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABDateProperty].
- **kABModificationDateProperty**: The date when the record was last saved. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABDateProperty].
